revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{User:MiszaBot/config |archiveheader = {{talkarchivenav}} |maxarchivesize = 70K |counter = 1 |minthreadsleft = 4 |minthreadstoarchive = 1 |algo = old(31d) |archive = Talk:School for Creative and Performing Arts/Archive %(counter)d }} {{ArticleHistory |action1=PR |action1date=10:00, 7 January 2010 |action1link=Wikipedia:Peer review/School for Creative and Performing Arts/archive1 |action1result=reviewed |action1oldid=336233909 |action2=GAN |action2date=01:43, 17 February 2010 |action2link=Talk:School for Creative and Performing Arts/GA1 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=344523532 |action3=PR |action3date=09:38, 17 August 2010 |action3link=Wikipedia:Peer review/School for Creative and Performing Arts/archive2 |action3result=reviewed |action3oldid=379303509 |action4=FAC |action4date=01:24, 28 September 2010 |action4link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/School for Creative and Performing Arts/archive1 |action4result=promoted |action4oldid=387331628 | topic = socsci |currentstatus=FA |maindate=December 1, 2011 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject United States|class=FA|importance=Low|OH=Yes|OH-importance=Low|Cincinnati=yes|Cincinnati-importance=high}} {{WikiProject Schools|class=FA|importance=High}} {{WikiProject Guild of Copy Editors|user=Shirik|date=4 January 2010}} }} {{archives}} == Congrats == As an editor and a resident of OTR, I was surprised and happy to see this on the main page. Nice work, everyone who contributed to making this article FA. [[User:Petropoxy (Lithoderm Proxy)|Litho]][[User talk:Petropoxy (Lithoderm Proxy)|derm]] 00:06, 1 December 2011 (UTC) == OTR not the largest urban HD == The [[Butte-Anaconda Historic District]] is a larger urban historic district: OTR has 943 [[contributing property|contributing properties]] in 362.5 acres, while Butte-Anaconda has 6015 contributing properties in 2,720 acres. You can go with {{NRISref|version=2010a}} as a source; summaries of the data can be found by going to http://www2.elkman.net/nrhp/infobox.php (run by [[User:Elkman|Elkman]]) and alternately entering 83001985 and 66000438 (the reference numbers for OTR and for Butte-Anaconda) into the lower blank. I'd do it, but I don't have time to add a decent citation. [[User:Nyttend|Nyttend]] ([[User talk:Nyttend|talk]]) 04:24, 1 December 2011 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:3|one external link|3 external links}} on [[School for Creative and Performing Arts]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=702336934 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20100530062032/http://www.cincinnati-oh.gov/cdap/pages/-6758-/ to http://www.cincinnati-oh.gov/cdap/pages/-6758-/ *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20080808142153/http://www.cincinnati-oh.gov/cdap/pages/-9438-/ to http://www.cincinnati-oh.gov/cdap/pages/-9438-/ *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20110718073539/http://www.wlwt.com/r/14802376/detail.html to http://www.wlwt.com/r/14802376/detail.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 23:30, 29 January 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:19|one external link|19 external links}} on [[School for Creative and Performing Arts]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=706763918 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether.
